name: A.C.O.R.N.
description:
All capitalonialists oughta resign now! 

..and it is not a joke. We have suffered enough under the regime of industry and so-called innovation! Our home will not fall to the wicked plans of trillionaires or any other human businessmen. We shall fight the police, the rich and colonizers… everything they throw at us.

It is final.

It’s us or them.

We must protect our home!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Use Up/Down arrow keys or W/S to steer the ship.

Use Right arrow key or D to shoot projectiles.

Use Left arrow key or A to enable the shield.

Make the space molotov rain!
